dtliExcerpt: MJ succeeds most when it focuses on Jackson's artistry and creative process, particularly in the thrilling dance sequences that showcase his revolutionary moves.

keyPhrases.quote: MJ succeeds most when it focuses on Jackson's artistry and creative process
thrilling dance sequences that showcase his revolutionary moves
particularly in the thrilling dance sequences

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: This excerpt praises specific elements (dance sequences, artistry) but the phrase 'succeeds most when' implies the show doesn't always succeed, suggesting mixed quality with strong highlights. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights the strengths of the production, particularly the dance sequences, indicating a clear but measured recommendation.
